listItem(address,uint256,uint256).details: 1. Send the NFT to the contract. Transfer => Contract hold the NFT(escrow method) 1.1 Gas expensive to list NFTs 1.2 Marketplace will hold the NFT and the user will not be able to claim that its his/her NFT 1.2.1 technically they could by withdrawing the NFT 2. Owners can still hold their NFT, and give the marketplace approval to sell the NFT for them(using this approach)

params.price: : sale price of the listed NFT
params.tokenId: : the token Id of the NFT

listItem(address,uint256,uint256).notice: function for listing NFT to the Marketplace
